Bioflu: Paracetamol 500 mg + Phenylephrine HCl 10 mg + Chlorphenamine Maleate 2 mg
Dayzinc: Sodium Ascorbate 562.4 mg + Zinc Sulfate Monohydrate 27.5 mg
Decolgen: Paracetamol 500 mg + Chlorpheniramine Maleate 2 mg + Phenylpropanolamine HCl 25 mg
Cardiclear Omega-3 Fish Oil: Fish Oil 1000 mg (EPA 180 mg, DHA 120 mg), Vitamin E 1 mg
Kremil-S: Aluminum Hydroxide 178 mg, Magnesium Hydroxide 233 mg, Simeticone 30 mg

Dayzinc: Vitamin C & Zinc deficiency, immune support
Bactidol Extra Soothing: Symptomatic treatment of acute sore throat, pharyngitis, catarrh, and post-operative throat discomfort

Kremil-S: 1–2 tablets after meals and at bedtime
Bactidol Extra Soothing: 1 lozenge every 2–3 hours, max 8 per day; not for children under 6

Alaxan FR: Avoid in liver/kidney impairment, ulcers, heart failure, alcohol; monitor function in long-term use.
Bioflu: Do not mix with alcohol or other paracetamol products. May cause drowsiness.
Biogesic: Liver damage risk with overdose/alcohol. Avoid in systemic illness.
Dayzinc: Caution in hyperoxaluria, kidney issues. Do not exceed dosage.
Decolgen: May cause drowsiness, avoid alcohol. Use with caution in hypertension.
Cardiclear Omega-3 Fish Oil: Avoid if allergic to seafood. No other warnings listed.
Kremil-S: Avoid in kidney disease, GI obstruction. Risk of phosphate depletion.
Medicol Advance: Risk of allergic reaction, stomach bleeding, cardiovascular issues.
Neozep Z+ Forte: Caution in hypertension, diabetes, thyroid disease, glaucoma.
Bactidol Extra Soothing: Do not use if pregnant/breastfeeding unless necessary. Not for children under 6.
